item.title: 0889 SHOP
item.description: score:889 Chances: Despite Shopify posting better-than-expected second-quarter revenue and adjusted earnings per share, analysts upgraded their 12-month price targets for the stock after digesting the solid results. Shopify’s second-quarter results benefited from growth in merchant solutions revenues and an expanding merchant base. Shopify’s President, Harley Finkelstein, discussed how the e-commerce company is approaching a potential U.
